Title: CSRF Vulnerability
Description: A number of form actions in the Forum module are directly accessible. A malicious user (e.g. spammer) can use GET requests to create Members and post to forums, bypassing CSRF and anti-spam measures. Additionally, a forum moderator could be tricked into clicking a specially crafted URL, resulting in a topic being moved.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 0.6.2, all versions starting from 0.7.0 before 0.7.4
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 0.6.2 before 0.7.0, all versions starting from 0.7.4
